9.9 Tajjanīyakammakathā
Campeyyakkhandhaka
Tajjanīyakammakathā
407.
1841“Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu bhaṇḍanakārako hoti kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako. Tatra ce bhikkhūnaṃ evaṃ hoti—  ‘ayaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu bhaṇḍanakārako kalahakārako vivādakārako bhassakārako saṃghe adhikaraṇakārako. Handassa mayaṃ tajjanīyakammaṃ karomā’ti. Te tassa tajjanīyakammaṃ karonti—  adhammena vaggā. So tamhā āvāsā aññaṃ āvāsaṃ gacchati. Tatthapi bhikkhūnaṃ evaṃ hoti—  ‘ayaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu saṃghena tajjanīyakammakato adhammena vaggehi.
